kinetic.client.p2p

Class Operation

  • java.lang.Object
    • kinetic.client.p2p.Operation

  • public class Operation
extends java.lang.Object
    Kinetic peer to peer push operation specification.

    The connected host service performs a PUT operation to the peer for the entry found with the specified key.

    Author:
    chiaming
